newuser.name: newuser
newuser.desc: Creates a new user in the database with your Shopify credentials sent in the email

bindKey.name: bindKey
bindKey.desc: Binds a given license key to your account, and adds data to your account

generate.name: generate
generate.desc: User interactable prompt to generate proxies for country, type, and quantity

data.name: data
data.desc: Gets the remaining bandwidth left for your account, in GB

help.name: help
help.desc: Shows info about the commands available to the bot

generatekeys.name: generatekeys
generatekeys.desc: Generate a specified number of keys with a specified amount of bandwidth

bind.name: bind
bind.desc: Adds proxies to your account based on what you ordered off Shopify

addip.name: addip
addip.desc: Binds another ip to your account, max of 5
